channel.title: [317]Forsaken Assasination[317]
channel.description:
[ul][size=14pt][b]Intro[/b][/size]
Well as i had said before i am starting a new project and from that time i had found a pretty blank source (Bronze-Age). After downloading it i made it more simple by removing all npc's and adding new interface and stances just to get up with the times. The reason i am starting a new project is because the 508 had to many bugs (Thanks Davidi2), and not only that but people are more interested in 317's in my opinion.
[size=14pt][b]Features[/b][/size]
The features as i said before were. . . [list] [li]New interface[/li] [li](Took off godsword stances for the time being)[/li] [li]New combat npc's[/li] [li]New home[/li] [li]New Commands[/li] [li]Firemaking, Woodcutting, All combat, (thats all i know of for sure)[/li] [li]Nice and clean :][/li] [li]Staff Zone[/li] [li]Working on adding skillcapes[/li] [li]New jail system[/li] [li]There are no mods or admins or owners, instead of regular players they are assasins and as you move up in rank like mod or admin your rank will change to higher classes of assasins. If you don't like then i will remove.[/li] [/list]
[size=14pt][b]Staff[/b][/size]
I am now adding rules to the application. Ease up on the beta testers and admin ingame and forum, there is to many applications for that. So before you post anything look at the replies before yours and see if multiple people have asked for the position. And if you are the one of the first posters then go for a lower position please and thank you.
Application[/ul] [code]Name: Age: MSN: Time zone: Dedication: Position: Why do you want the position: Experience: Extra: (optional) [/code]
Ingame Admin - OPEN Ingame Admin - OPEN
Ingame Mod - EmulousGuru Ingame Mod - kossploss Ingame Mod - OPEN
Graphic design - OPEN Graphic design - OPEN Graphic design - OPEN
Java coder - EmulousGuru Java coder - kossploss Java coder - OPEN Java coder - OPEN
Forum Mod - OPEN Forum Mod - OPEN Forum Mod - OPEN
Forum Admin - OPEN Forum Admin - OPEN
Beta Tester - OPEN Beta Tester - OPEN
Advisor - OPEN
Any other positions you can think of just pm me and see if they qualify, thank you.
[size=14pt]Ending[/size]
I also need a name for it, it is not called R A R E S project, but that will come later. Thank you for taking your time to read this and if you are applying thank you. I also asked the creater of Bronze age if i could use his client and source as a base and he agreed.
If you need to contact me here is my MSN: rsps-freak@hotmail.com
May keep the name may not i will have a pole for you to vote for your favorite name!

item.title: [317]Forsaken Assasination[317]
item.dc:creator: @i_lawdog_i i lawdog i
item.description:
@i_lawdog_i wrote:

Name: Kyle
Age: 17
MSN: crugrockz@yahoo.com
Time zone: (GMT-06:00) Central Time (US & Canada)
Dedication: I will keep the server up and not let it down. Help all the players! Donate as much as $10 a month to keep the server up and running
Position: Coder for server and ill have in-game mod
Why do you want the position: I want this position so i can help a server get more populated!
Experience:I have coded for 3 years now i started at a 317 level and now I’m at a 635 level coding (just coded someones 635 server so when Runescape updated to 635 he would have it, but unfortunatly he had school)

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Forsaken Assasination[317]
item.dc:creator: @kossploss kossploss
item.description:
@kossploss wrote:

[quote=“R A R E S, post:37, topic:364870”][quote author=kossploss link=topic=461076.msg3376960#msg3376960 date=1287696884]
Name: Ahmed
Age: 16
MSN: ahmedj10@hotmail.com
Time zone: Canada/Quebec
Dedication: As long and the server is alive ill be dedicated =)
Position: Server Coder and or (in game admin/mod)

Why do you want the position: Because i have been learning coding at school java 100%, i wanna work with a team and apply all my knowledge, there a few thing i can do. Im learning more about each day of java. I know runescape for so long i played runescape from it begin and stop for a bit when my accound got hacked and started back then on Runescape Private Servers.
I was mod on a few server till recently when my friend server died… I apply all rules and respect them.
Experience: Java ( bout 9 month ) runescape (years lol ^_^)
[/quote]

Well man i have awesome respect for your country and your one of the few people who actually applied for a java coder and i think me and you will get a long fine so your in :] i will give you mod for now. Then when we get to know each other you will get admin. thank you and welcome to the team[/quote]

Alright thanks buddy doesent really mather about mod or admin either are find as mainly ill be coding ^^.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Forsaken Assasination[317]
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:18, topic:364870”]Name: Thomas.
Age: Fifteen.
MSN: EmulousGuru@hotmail.com [size=15pt]*[/size]
Time zone: GMT -5 (I think) (USA - East Coast)
Dedication: Long as needed.
Position: Content developer; In-game admin/moderator; Forums admin/moderator.
Why do you want the position:

[ul][li]Content: I can help add exciting things to the server, such as treasure trails, quests, minigames, random events, and even newer skills.[/li][li]In-game staff: I can help run the game, and make sure nothing goes wrong with the economy/player’s opinions on the server.[/li][li]Forum staff: I are usually on forums a lot, whether it’s Mopar, R-S, RL, Silab, or custom server communities. I abide by most rules, as sometimes I lose my temper, and do tend to flame people.[/li][/ul]

Experience: I’ve been coding Emulous servers since Emulous was released, and I know a lot about Project Insanity. - Just check the RS2 Help section, and you’ll see I help with almost every PI problem.
Extra: I’m awesome. ;D
[center][size=15pt]* denotes I have errors with that field’s input.[/size]
(MSN keeps saying invalid user/pass, but it lets me log in to MSN.com,[br]I can change password and all, but the MSN client gives me invalid ID/password errors.)[/center][/quote]
What do you mean content developer? Just wandering.

Read full topic
